title: Mystery gift missing?
body:
I just log in , and receive a message from riot that i got a mystery gift from them ! 
I press ok and then ....Nothing... lol

is it normal ? where can i found what they send me?  Is it a bug and how can i ask them again to get it? 

thank you :)

replies.body: The notification you received was for the anniversary icon.  Gifts are being sent out individually, and not everyone has received them yet.  Bookmark our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) for updates on our progress so far.  Stand by until all of this is finished!
At least you got something. I still have yet to receive anything lol. Probably just gotta be patient.
Just a precision ... i just receive that kayle skin lol maybe this is the mystery gift lol and ill wait for the icon too ;)
